Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394216) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394216)
